skills.name: Wooden plank
skills.description: (name character) took this wooden plank in order to start his path and try to defeat hsi enemies.

skills.name: The bible
skills.description: (name character) is a religious man that always brings his bible in his bag, now he has to defend himself in the name of God.

skills.name: Brew
skills.description: (name character) saw this strange drink on a table and he thought that could be useful to recover himself.

skills.name: injection
skills.description: (name character) saw the doctor's suitcase and he decided to took some stuff. However he didn't notice that it was a shot of adrenaline that will boost himself.

skills.name: Special soup
skills.description: When (name character) arrived to the kitchen he found a pot with a soup but what he didn't notice that he will have a boost of hp and def.

skills.name: Carrot's shurikens
skills.description: When (name char) is in the kitchen he found 3 carrots and why don't use them to attack enemies.

skills.name: Haunted pen
skills.description: When (name char) arrives to the hall he sees a pen levitating and he decided to took it with him and not for write anything. The oen throws 2 burst of ink that  hurts and decreases the defence of the enemies

skills.name: Ceiling light jump
skills.description: He sees that if he arrives to the roof's light he can make an amazing jump that makes a lot of damage but he hurts himself.
He sees that if he arrives to the roof's light he can make an amazing jump that makes a lot of damage but he hurts himself.

skills.name: Ceiling light jump
skills.description: He sees that if he arrives to the roof's light he can make an amazing jump that makes a lot of damage but he hurts himself.

Scenarios.name: Deck
Scenarios.description: When (name character) arrives to the ship what it is obvious is that he finds the deck where he starts to see some rare things that were not supposed to be there.

Scenarios.name: 3rd class floor
Scenarios.descripion: While (name character) advances through the floors of the ship he notices that it is not as he thought. Now he is in the 3rd class floor where the situation and the conditions of the trip are very precarious.

Scenarios.name: Kitchen
Scenarios.description: After the horrible conditions that he has seen before now he arrives to the kitchen but he was surprised (not for good),he found some strange food and people that he has to pass through to continue his path.

Scenarios.name: 2nd class floor
Scenarios.description: Now he arrives to the 2nd class floor, the things have changed unfortunately not in a goodway for (name char), he arrives and see new staff and another type of enemies that he has to beat.Â¿It might be the end of(name)?

Scenarios.name: hall
Scenarios.description: Now he finds the hall, maybe you think that it is strange to find the hall at this point but what is stranger is the objects movements and the special enemies that there arein the hall.

Scenarios.name: 1st class floor
Scenarios.description: (name char) are sourround by the most sophisticated area of the ship as well as the most sophisticated enemies that there are in the floor.

Scenarios.name: hold
Scenarios.description: Finally he arrives to the hold the least floor of the ship. Now he has to fight against the last and most difficult enemy he has never seen
